decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design & Access Statement (dated August 2016), OR 101, OR 102, OR 103, OR 104, OR 105, OR 106, OR 107, OR 108, OR 109, Unnumbered Location Plan, Received: 16/08/2016. Flood Risk Assessment (Environment Agency), Flood Risk Assessment, Received: 01/09/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey extension to the house
